• home

Say Goodbye to wrinkles, fine lines, and sagging skin with the plasma pen in Cape Town

You’re starting to see wrinkles and fine lines around your eyes, mouth, cheeks, neck, and hands. Your skin isn’t as elastic as it used to be, and you’ve started to notice sagging in some areas.


The Plasma Pen can help you achieve a more youthful appearance by stimulating the production of collagen in your skin. This will help reduce the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, and sagging skin.  It is the best treatment for firm skin and creates a fresh look.


The Plasma Pen is the latest cosmetic procedure that can combat wrinkles, loss of collagen, and sagging skin. As we age, our dermal layer starts to thin and we produce less collagen. The Plasma Pen uses fibroblast therapy to stimulate the production of collagen in the skin, giving you a more youthful appearance.

Book Your procedure

What is a plasma pen and how does it work?

The Plasma Pen is a hand-held device that uses plasma energy to stimulate the production of collagen in your skin. It works by delivering a focused beam of plasma energy to the skin, which heats the tissue and stimulates the production of collagen.

Collagen is a protein that helps to keep your skin firm and elastic. As we age, our bodies produce less collagen, which can lead to wrinkles and sagging skin. The Plasma Pen can help to reverse this process by stimulating the production of collagen in your skin.

The Plasma Pen is easy to use and can be done in a short session. Your practitioner will clean your skin and apply a numbing cream to help minimize any discomfort. Once your skin is numbed, your aesthetic therapist will hold the Plasma Pen against your skin and deliver the plasma energy.

You may experience some redness and swelling after the procedure, but this usually subsides within a few days. You’ll see a noticeable improvement in the appearance of your skin within a few weeks as new collagen is produced.

Book Your procedure

The benefits of Plasma Pen Procedure

  • Stimulates the production of collagen
  • Minimizes the appearance of pores
  • Reduces redness and inflammation
  • Improves skin texture
  • Safe and effective
  • Improve and brighten skin tone, laxity, and texture
  • Dramatically reduce, inflate, and plump lines and wrinkles
  • New technology alternative to injectables (ex. botox & fillers)
Book Your procedure

How Does the Plasma Pen Procedure Work at Blink Beauty Salons?

Before Treatment

A thorough consultation starts our appointment, whereby we explain the procedure and discuss your end result requirements.

Your skin will be cleaned, and a numbing cream will be applied to minimize any discomfort during the treatment. It is advisable to arrive 15 minutes early to start with your consultation and apply numbing cream to the treated area. The entire process usually takes about one to two hours.

During Treatment

The Plasma emits a focused beam of plasma energy that penetrates the skin and heats the tissue. This process stimulates the production of collagen in your skin.  A visible skin tightening effect is seen straight after your procedure and will continue to tighten during the healing phase.

After Treatment

Since the downtime of this plasma pen treatment is very low, you can usually return to your normal activities immediately. After your procedure, you might experience some sensitive skin. Many patients report mild to moderate redness and swelling, but this usually goes away within a few days. Some people might have temporary dark spots for the first week or two after treatment.

We recommend avoiding strenuous activity, sun exposure, and hot showers for the first 24 hours after treatment.

We’re more than just a company- we want to ensure that you know how to properly take care of your skin after one of our treatments. Our team is always available for questions or concerns during and even after your recovery, so please do not hesitate to reach out!

You will receive in-depth aftercare instructions for the best results.

Book Your procedure

Why Choose Blink Beauty for Your Plasma Pen Treatment?

The Plasma Pen is a cutting-edge non-surgical skin tightening treatment that has only recently become available. This procedure is not widely available in the Cape Town area, but Blink Beauty is proud to offer this treatment to our clients.

Our experienced and certified practitioners team is dedicated to providing our clients with the best possible results. We offer a free consultation to discuss your goals and expectations for the treatment. We also provide aftercare instructions to help you care for your skin after the procedure.

If you’re looking for a non-surgical way to improve the appearance of your skin, the Plasma Pen might be the right treatment for you. Contact Blink to book your appointment today.

Book Your procedure

Plasma pen before and after

Book Your procedure

Book Your procedure

What do plasma pen procedures cost?

  • Eyelids - Blepharosplasty (45 minutes) R1 750
  • Crowsfeets (45 minutes) R1 750
  • Frown lines / bunny lines (30 minutes) R1 200
  • Forehead lines (60 minutes) R1 950
  • Lip - top/bottom (60 minutes) R2 000
  • Marionette lines (60 minutes) R2 500
  • Neck (90 minutes) R3 000
  • Cheeks (90 minutes) R3 000
  • Hands (90 minutes) R3 000
  • Full Face (120 minutes) R4 500
Book Your procedure

Frequently asked questions about plasma pen

What is a plasma pen and how does it work?

The Plasma Pen is a hand-held device that uses plasma energy to stimulate the production of collagen in your skin. It works by delivering a focused beam of plasma energy to the skin, which heats up the tissue and stimulates the production of collagen.

What are the benefits of a plasma pen procedure?

There are many benefits to having a plasma pen procedure, including stimulating the production of collagen, minimizing the appearance of pores, reducing redness and inflammation, improving skin texture, and providing safe and effective results.

How long does a plasma pen procedure take?

A plasma pen procedure is 1 to 2 hours, depending on the treated area.

How long does it take to see results from a plasma pen procedure?

You may notice some immediate results from your plasma pen procedure, but the full effects will become apparent over the next few weeks as new collagen is produced.

Are there any side effects associated with plasma pen procedures?

Side effects from plasma pen procedures are typically mild and include redness, swelling, and bruising. These side effects usually resolve within a few days.

Who is a good candidate for a plasma pen procedure?

Most people who are concerned about wrinkles, fine lines, or sagging skin are good candidates for a plasma pen procedure.

How much does a plasma pen procedure cost?

 

 

The cost of a plasma pen procedure will vary depending on the location, extent of treatment, and other factors.

Is a plasma pen procedure covered by insurance?

Plasma pen procedures are typically considered cosmetic and are not covered by insurance / medical aid.

Do I need multiple plasma pen procedures to treat an area

Most people will need multiple plasma pen procedures to treat an area. The number of treatments needed will vary depending on the size and depth of the wrinkles being treated.
Our plasma pen specialist will discuss the recommended number of sessions during your consultation. 

What are the risks associated with plasma pen procedures?

The risks associated with plasma pen procedures are typically mild and include redness, swelling, and bruising.
